name: Fidget Spinner-Toy Collector
description:
You have tried the rest, now is the time for the best. Spin and collect all the cool spinners you can imagine, constantly update with new fidget spinner every week! Can you collect them all?

A fidget spinner is a toy that sits like a propeller on a person’s finger, with blades that spin around a bearing. Basically a fidget spinner consists of a two or three pronged design with a bearing in its center circular pad. You’ve seen them on the streets, on your commute and in your office; fidget spinners. Now these stress relieving toys come to your hand on your iPhone. With this simulator game, you no longer need a real fidget spinner! Flick them for fun or for dumping your excess energy now!

You have 5 swipes to set the best spin you can. Use your hand finger to swipe the spinner left or right, wait for it to stop and sweep the sweet rewards! Upgrade your finger spinner, compete with your friends and beat the records!

Each spin brings you closer to unlocking a new hand spinner toy.

*Game Features*
- Realistic simulator with authentic spinning physics
- A lot of fidget spinners to unlock
- Earn coins through spinning
- Upgrade your spinner to reach even more high-score
